* retrieve token
  * `curl -verbose -X POST -d "grant_type=password" -d "client_id=javacream_client" -d "client_secret=5fa83523-72ac-42a0-950d-8d61a27a978c" -d "username=rainersawitzki" -d "password=javacream" -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' http://localhost:8080/auth/realms/Javacream/protocol/openid-connect/token`
  * find and copy access token
